description: Measures ability to analyze numerical data, interpret charts and tables, and draw logical conclusions
Assesses understanding, evaluation, and interpretation of written information
Evaluates the ability to identify patterns, relationships, and logical rules
Measures personality traits, work preferences, and behavioral tendencies in workplace scenarios
Assesses behavioral preferences and how individuals typically behave at work
Measures ability to work flexibly with unfamiliar information and identify underlying rules
Assesses understanding of mechanical and physical principles through practical problems
Evaluates responses to realistic workplace scenarios to assess judgement and decision-making
Measures ability to detect errors, maintain focus, and work accurately under time pressure
Assesses leadership potential, people management capabilities, and strategic decision-making
